TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Handler extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A Handler allows you to send and process Message and Runnable objects associated with a thread's MessageQueue.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Post (Java.Lang.IRunnable r);
.method public hidebysig instance bool Post(class Java.Lang.IRunnable r) cil managed
member this.Post : Java.Lang.IRunnable -> bool

Docs.param: The Runnable that will be executed.
Docs.summary: Causes the Runnable r to be added to the message queue.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the Runnable was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The Runnable that will be executed.

Docs.returns: Returns true if the message was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool PostAtTime (Java.Lang.IRunnable r, long uptimeMillis);
.method public hidebysig instance bool PostAtTime(class Java.Lang.IRunnable r, int64 uptimeMillis) cil managed
member this.PostAtTime : Java.Lang.IRunnable * int64 -> bool

Docs.param: The Runnable that will be executed.
The absolute time at which the callback should run, using the android.os.SystemClock#uptimeMillis time-base.
Docs.summary: Causes the Runnable r to be added to the message queue, to be run at a specific time given by <var>uptimeMillis</var>.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the Runnable was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting. Note that a result of true does not mean the Runnable will be processed -- if the looper is quit before the delivery time of the message occurs then the message will be dropped.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SendMessage (Android.OS.Message msg);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SendMessage(class Android.OS.Message msg) cil managed
member this.SendMessage : Android.OS.Message -> bool

Docs.summary: Pushes a message onto the end of the message queue after all pending messages before the current time.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the message was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SendMessageAtFrontOfQueue (Android.OS.Message msg);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SendMessageAtFrontOfQueue(class Android.OS.Message msg) cil managed
member this.SendMessageAtFrontOfQueue : Android.OS.Message -> bool

Docs.summary: Enqueue a message at the front of the message queue, to be processed on the next iteration of the message loop.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the message was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SendMessageAtTime (Android.OS.Message msg, long uptimeMillis);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SendMessageAtTime(class Android.OS.Message msg, int64 uptimeMillis) cil managed
abstract member SendMessageAtTime : Android.OS.Message * int64 -> bool override this.SendMessageAtTime : Android.OS.Message * int64 -> bool

Docs.param: The absolute time at which the message should be delivered, using the android.os.SystemClock#uptimeMillis time-base.
Docs.summary: Enqueue a message into the message queue after all pending messages before the absolute time (in milliseconds) <var>uptimeMillis</var>.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the message was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting. Note that a result of true does not mean the message will be processed -- if the looper is quit before the delivery time of the message occurs then the message will be dropped.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SendMessageDelayed (Android.OS.Message msg, long delayMillis);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SendMessageDelayed(class Android.OS.Message msg, int64 delayMillis) cil managed
member this.SendMessageDelayed : Android.OS.Message * int64 -> bool

Docs.summary: Enqueue a message into the message queue after all pending messages before (current time + delayMillis).
Docs.returns: Returns true if the message was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting. Note that a result of true does not mean the message will be processed -- if the looper is quit before the delivery time of the message occurs then the message will be dropped.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
